dashboard.description: About the Splunk app for Alfresco

ul.li: Monitoring of Alfresco using Splunk and JMX
Provides metrics on both the Alfresco repository and SOLR components
SOLR: Query response time and QPS, cache performance
Alfresco: DB pool sizes, users, tickets
Alfresco + SOLR: JVM statistics (CPU, mem, GC, etc)
